Label: lbl.Restart
English: Application must be restarted for changes to take effect. Restart?
Español: La aplicación se debe reiniciar para que los cambios tengan efecto. Reiniciar?

Label: lbl.RestartSimulation
English: Simulation must be restarted for changes to take effect. Restart?
